title: GD I'm looking for an old digging game.
body:
It had a drill machine, alien races and really creepy things underground.

I was really young and my relative used to play it around me, I had nightmares about this game. [especially considering the death sounds]

I think it was 5 years newer than Prince of Persia, something like that. 

http://www.casualgirlgamer.com/assets/images/five-classic-games-you-can-play-in-your-browser/prince-of-persia.jpg
